title: brives887
author: brives887
content: The cosmos becomes your campaign ground in Zone of Avoidance, a PVP/PVE, Play-to-Earn, NFT-based auto battler. Purchase your NFT spaceship, crew it with heroes, and set out on a mission to the Zone of Avoidance from the New Milky Way. As you travel between worlds, you'll come across precious items and combat the locals who will go to any length to protect them.Synergize your team, equip them with powerful goods, and then choose your fighting formation strategically. Then sit back and watch the action unfold in real time. Upgrade your army as you progress and compete for the best slot in the online Zone of Avoidance rankings, gaining galactic glory and tantalizing gifts.Zone of Evasion is an auto-battler that pits players against their adversaries. Players control a spaceship that holds their heroes, with a few being upgradable with things. The center objective is basic: beat your adversary with predominant strategies and capacities, collect assets and update your group.
